title: The Frog princess
creator_credit: Paul N Peroff and Coronet Instructional Films
brief_description: An animated film which tells the story of a prince in search of a bride. He shoots an arrow into the air with the intention of marrying whoever finds it. But it is found by a frog, who is really an enchanted princess. Together they have many adventures until she is released from the spell.
